page.title: 02THE AREA THEN AND NOW
page.content: Many years ago there used to be a coal mine where the Tenlons Road Industrial Estate has now been built (04340290).In this same square the Arbury View Estate has been built on what was fields and allotments.The Glendale Estate has been built on the site of an old brickyard.In square 04350289 the Griff Arm canal used to be a stopping place for barges picking up coal from the local mines.In square 04340289 there used to be a lot of clay holes that have now been filled in.The clay had been used for the brickyards which have now been demolished.In square 04340288 there is now an industrial estate starting to develop (Griff Clara).In square 04350288 the Bedworth by-pass has cut a huge path through what was formerly fields.The by-pass starts at the Griff roundabout.
